title: House Republicans to Join Democrats in Epstein SOTU Protest

title: Travel Ban Lifted, Motorists Still Urged to Stay Off Roads
summary: Despite the lifted travel ban, motorists are advised to avoid roads due to ongoing dig-out efforts after the blizzard.

title: DOJ Sues UCLA After Refusal to Pay $1 Billion Fine
summary: The Department of Justice is suing UCLA after the university refused to pay a $1 billion fine.

title: Teens Increasingly Use Chatbots for Schoolwork: Survey

title: Louvre Director Resigns After Crown Jewels Heist
